messages.subject: Thanks for being here!
messages.msgSnippet: I m brand new here. Our 6 & 8 year old are finishing out this year of school (we also have a 2 year old), but I am so excited to transition our family into
messages.messageBody:
I'm brand new here. Our 6 & 8 year old are finishing out this year of school (we also have a 2 year old), but I am so excited to transition our family into this. It's a very recent discovery for us and the whole philosophy, though a little uncomfortable at first, resonates so well. I feel incredibly excited to be able to offer this to my kids. I'm also grateful for this community. Reading the comments here feels reassuring and supportive. It seems a bit of a lonely road pursuing something so out of the main stream and finding a community of like minded people is a gift.
Best wishes,
Brette
